title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, such as a .properties file, in the package viewer, an error occurs.
OB: When selecting a .java file and another resource in the package viewer, the synchronization process does not work as expected. No error message or indication is provided.
EB: The synchronization process should successfully synchronize the selected .java file and the other resource, without any errors or issues.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the package viewer. 2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer. 3. Attempt to synchronize the selected files. Check if the synchronization process is successful or if any error occurs.
